title: 2022 Round 1 Reaction
description:
Field Yates, Matthew Berry, Stephania Bell and Daniel Dopp react to the key selections that will have a fantasy impact in Round 1 of the 2022 NFL Draft including two draft day trades resulting in some WR’s on the move.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: The Crew Takes Some Time In Vegas To React To Round 1 Of The NFL Draft
